resources.string: HSK Flashcard Widget (v%1$s) is an open source project by Cyrille Berliat that stems from a personal need to learn Mandarin. \n \nIf it's useful to you, please consider supporting me and my countless hours of development :)
If you have any suggestions, feedback or issues, feel free to email me.

Privacy policy: I use Google Analytics to track usage, such as which tab is visited the most on which device class (Tablet, Smartphone). 
No Personal Identifiable Information (PII) data should be collected nor sent to me or Google Analytics. 
License: GNU GPLv3. In a nutshell, you can do whatever you want with it, but must display credit for the work and use the same license downstream. 
This project uses the awesome projects of: 
- Full CN-EN from CC-CEDICT list from https://www.mdbg.net/chinese/ 
- HSK list from https://github.com/krmanik/HSK-3.0 
- Dictionary metadata in Chinese (BETA!) was generated using Yi 1.5 6B - Q6_K LLM from 01.AI.
No email client found. Address copied to clipboard.
